name: Lands of Ophena
description:
The Lands of Ophena are rich - take your chance, and explore the land..

A programmer's first release - more of a test then anything else, but it's playable, and quite fun.

Controls:

WASD/Arrows = Moving.

Shift = Hold onto walls. Required to walljump/climb walls.

Space = Jump

Left/Right + Down = Sliding.

SHIFT + Moving towards wall = Hold onto wall.

Up/down while holding on wall - climbing or sliding down the wall.
